name: Exorcist 2: Crow Magic
description:
WARNING: This game may trigger seizures from people with photosensitive epilepsy. It is left to the discretion of the player.

IMPORTANT NOTE: You need to research your surroundings thoroughly to explore the game and progress in the game. Since the story of the game is supported by light, loud and sudden sounds, it can cause a lot of intimidation. Take into account that it feels a lot of fear and is a difficult game.
Exorcist 2: Crow Magic is a first-person psychological horror game.

Environment
The game's story takes place in an abandoned mansion, located in a house and elsewhere, in the depths of a desolate forest, far from the city.

The Subject Of The Game
After David Livingston's last job before retiring, he realized his commitment to his job and decided to return to work. David Livingston, an exorcist, is calmly playing the piano in his office one day, when his instincts kick in and he hears someone calling for help. The caller for help is Master Exorcist Derreck, who taught David Livingston everything he learned and raised him like his father. You will witness the events that happened to David Livingston, who set out to save his master.
